alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Clearfield; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:10PM EDT until July 23 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cambria County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania... Somerset County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 409 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Indiana to near Westmont to Acosta to near Friendsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Somerset, Westmont, Windber, Ebensburg, Belmont, Nanty-Glo, Portage, Northern Cambria, Geistown, Southmont and Meyersdale. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 101 to 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
